team.name: Sean|Donnelly
team.bio: Sean is currently pursuing a M.S. in Computer Science from Towson University. Prior to joining the CLARK team in 2017, he worked as Co-founder and CTO of Striations Fitness Co. He has a passion for software architecture, and the way in which good architecture can sculpt a corporate culture.

team.name: Gustavus|Shaw II
team.bio: Gus is an ambitious and experienced Software Developer with a demonstrated history working with startups and within the education industry. He is skilled in full stack development and software engineering and is a full time student pursuing a Bachelor’s Degree in Computer Science from Towson University.

team.name: Nick|Visalli
team.bio: Nick is a software developer who creates and maintains C.L.A.R.K. As a developer, he is responsible for understanding and using the MEAN stack, attending and participating in daily scrum meetings, and creating or enhancing various features within a timely fashion. Above all, Nick is mainly concerned with learning. He is determined to try new technologies and methodologies to become a better, more consistent, software developer. After the Fall 2018 semester, he will complete the undergraduate program at Towson University and will earn a BS in Computer Science with a concentration in software engineering.

team.name: Nick|Winner
team.bio: Nick is a full stack developer with a passion for good user interface design. He graduated with a B.S. degree in computer science and a focus in software engineering in December of 2017. He's currently pursuing a M.S. degree in computer science with a focus on data science. When he’s not coding, he enjoys watching Star Wars, playing the piano, dancing, and free running.

team.name: Bartholomew|Allen
team.bio: Bart is beginning his senior year at Towson University majoring in Computer science and is expected to graduate in Fall 2019. He taught himself basic web development during off semesters and aspires to go into Full Stack Development and Software Engineering. He is currently interning at UPS on a team where he's using Machine Learning to improve the Estimated Delivery Window. When he isn’t coding, he is running cross country, training for a 5k, or reading.

team.name: Golda Meir|Chiong
team.bio: Golda Meir is finishing up her last year at Towson University for computer science with a specialization in cybersecurity, and she is expected to graduate in May of 2019. She has interned at NIST focusing on research in computational reproducibility. She adores front-end development and is always thrilled to travel, work out, and sing.

team.name: Kolbe|Leonard
team.bio: Kolbe graduated from Towson University with a BS in Computer Science in spring 2018, and currently works as a technology analyst at JPMorgan Chase. She's passionate about clean code and ethics in computing, and has worked as a writing tutor for over 10 years. When she's not coding, you can find her cooking, gaming, or thinking about cats.

team.name: Nnatubemugo|Ngwum
team.bio: Nnatubemugo is currently a doctoral candidate whose role focuses on security policy and quality metrics of CLARK. He has experience in academia and industry, and he holds a master’s degree in Advanced Computer Science specializing in Computer Security from the University of Manchester, United Kingdom.

team.name: Emily|Vogel
team.bio: Emily is an Undergraduate Student at Towson University, majoring in Computer Science with a track in Software Engineering.  She works in many areas of the team, including Front and Back-End work, as well as a teaching assistant in an introductory computer science course.  Emily has been coding since her first computer science class at Arundel High School and has excelled since then in her academics.  She loves the challenge computer science has to offer in addition to the creativity needed to create and build applications.
